works.description:
I am the General Counsel of Gulf Capital Pvt JSC, a company incorporated in the United Arab Emirates which is also regulated by the United Arab Emirates Central Bank.   Gulf Capital has over 300 shareholders and is one of the leading private equity firms in the middle east.  Gulf Capital owns all intellectual property rights to its website www.gulfcapital.com.

It has come to our attention that someone, in breach of copyright law and other intellectual property rights has duplicated 99% of our web site under the domain name www.sinogulfcapital.com .  As you will see, not all details could be replicated such as the investor log in information, however, they have replicated pictures, logo (which we hold a registered trade mark over) and stated their board of directors are our board of directors.  The fraudsters have also not provided phone numbers in their contact information.

We seek your help in removing all mentions of “www.sinogulfcapital.com” from searches made through your search engine.

If you have any questions, please contact Daniel Parry, General Counsel on +971 50 662 4213 or dparry@gulfcapital.com.

Thank you for your time.

Daniel Parry
